physical_appearance:The image displays the front cover of a magazine. There are Chinese characters at the magazine\u0027s masthead as well as at its bottom half. Four children dressed in their respective school uniforms are sitting down alongside one another
 at the top of a sloping surface. The background shows trees and it suggests that this image was taken outdoors.  The image displays the front cover of a magazine. sgcool_label_text:This is an issue of a monthly magazine that was published by the Ministry of Education. It is a Chinese publication that provided information on schooling matters and served as a platform for parents and stakeholders in education to share their views.
